column5: My Boy was Cleaning a bass today----get down to the tail section---and this pops out of the meat  Not the guts---it was in the meat at the tail section---you can see the indent where it was  The brown gross lookin thing was it---I'm guessin a tumour of sorts  Anyway---never seen that before---and I've cleaned  what seems like a Cajillion fish over the years
Must be a one in a cajillion event.  Fry it up.... can't taste all that bad if you dip it in butter
Ya could be a tumour, or maybe a foreign object that a mass formed around?
I was wonderin about that   not sure how something would get in tail section though??
Mash it with a few drops of linseed oil, a little burnt umber and a dab of van dyck and you've got an incredible backdrop for creek bottoms.
Good idea---may be just a little too homegrown for this painter though
Send the pic to the MNR they might know what it is.
Your lucky that's all you found in a "bass"......
New way to smuggle dope, the dogs will never sniff that baby especially in a Bass
A little bit of vomit came up my throat.
ITS NOT A TUMOR!

Re: Bass  I don't eat pike  I like to eat Largemouth better than walleye---I may have eaten too many walleyes in my life  Smallies are good---can be a bit stronger taste  and of course trout go without sayin
What could it be??---remembering it was a ways away from the guts
Maybe if it was said with a think Austrian accent.  "It's not a toomah"
bass with prostate cancer....................?
I had something similar, actually nearly exact (double in size) in a Lake Erie Walleye, in about the same area of the flesh too! Not very appetizing......"GAG"
That is discusting
Best line so far.
Flesh eating disease!!
Might be from an old injury that has healed over.
Looks like he was growing his brain in his behind
